entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
